name: Missile Control
description:
Created for bit jam by Steven Miller

The warheads have been launched. The only way to stop them now is to detonate them before they reach their destinations, and the only way to do that is run the only program capable of saving humanity: Missile Control.exe.

-Work your way through 6 different types of cryptic puzzles

-Detonate 9 different warheads of varying difficulty that are different each time you play

WARNING: Flashing lights

Inspired by Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
